attributes.action: If one is unable to obtain the services of an NHS dentist the Government should reimburse the cost or reduce NI contributions accordingly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, an element of our National Insurance contribution goes towards NHS dental treatment. Many of us cannot get an NHS dentist and as such we are paying for a service we aren't receiving. Unfair? I think so and I believe we should get a reimbursement for this. If you agree, please add your name to our petition and let's see if we get a response.
